description:
Don’t let a little darkness get in the way of your campsite’s Go Fish tournament. Whether you’re lighting a picnic table card game, or a bit of after dark bike maintenance, the Ultra 2 3.0 M helps you make the most out of your day. There are 3 different light temperatures to choose from and infinite dimming, so you can start the day with a little warm light and shift to bright, high contrast cool white when doing detail work. And the large onboard battery doubles as a power bank.

  • 3 different white light temperatures: cool (6500K), natural (4200K), or warm (3000K)
  • 11,600mAh battery can also be used to charge other USB powered devices, via the type-A USB port
  • Smooth dimming, just press and hold the button to dial in your perfect brightness; range: 40-1200 lumens
  • SOS mode is there if things take a turn for the worse
  • Tilting rear handle and hook for aiming the light
  • LED battery indicator lets you know how your battery is doing in use and while charging
  • IP65 waterproofing isn’t bothered by heavy rain
  • Rugged case with a handle that doubles as a roll cage
  • Easy USB-C charging, 0-100% in 6h
  • ¼” thread tripod mounts let you mount your light on tripods or other camera mounts
  • Dimensions: 12.5 x 11.6 x 4cm
  • In the box: Ultra 2 3.0 M Area Light, lantern hook, storage case, USB-C charging cable, and manual
  • During storage fully charge the Ultra 2 3.0 M Area Light every 3-6 months and store in a cool, dry place
name: Claymore Ultra 2 3.0 Area Light
